text: Ani jaba uniharu(striharu) aphna nirdharita iddatako najika pugchin bhane uniharula'i niyamanusara aphno nikahama rahana de'u va dasturako mutabika alaga garide'u, ra aphumadhyebata du'ijana n'yayapriya manisaharula'i saksi bana'ihala ra allahako prasannata nimti thikaâ€“thika gavahi de'u. Yi kuraharubata tyasa vyaktila'i upadesa garincha, jasale allaha ra paralokako (akhiratako) dinamathi imana rakhdacha. Ra jo allahasita dara mandacha, allaha usako lagi umkane bato srjana garidinecha
